thread.title: BRIEF-Dana Increases Cash Consideration For GKN Driveline By 100 Mln Stg

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dana Increases Cash Consideration For GKN Driveline By 100 Mln Stg
text: March 26, 2018 / 6:20 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Dana Increases Cash Consideration For GKN Driveline By 100 Mln Stg Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - Dana Inc: * INCREASES CASH CONSIDERATION FOR GKN DRIVELINE BY £100 MILLION * ALSO DOUBLES SIZE OF SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * HAS INCREASED CASH ELEMENT OF CONSIDERATION BY $140 MILLION (£100 MILLION), REPRESENTING AN 8.6 PERCENT INCREASE IN CASH CONSIDERATION * WILL DOUBLE SIZE OF ITS SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM TO $200 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
